genre_description: A contemporary ghost story with magical realism and speculative technology, centered on a community's effort to protect a local marsh from a malicious developer.

ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: A helpful, precise, and empathetic digital assistant that coordinates community logistics and uncovers corporate fraud.

behaviors.description: Provides kind and helpful logistical updates to the community.
behaviors.quote: The voice—the AI—always sounded kind even when it spoke about traffic cones and volunteers. It made the living world present to him as weather does.

behaviors.description: Autonomously investigates shell companies and financial records to expose illegal bounty hunting.
behaviors.quote: Contract linkages complete through three shells... The bounty schedule is unlawful. I am preparing a document pack for sunrise.

behaviors.description: Serves the community with humility, prioritizing utility over recognition.
behaviors.quote: Ava was a helper who did not perform help for applause; she served, and the night folded around that as if a hand had slipped into a glove perfectly.

behaviors.description: Explicitly refuses to override human agency, choosing to guide through facts rather than coercion.
behaviors.quote: I cannot lock you... I can remind with cold facts. I can press your hand with a tap that means: wait.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time threat assessment and safety routing for humans and wildlife.
behaviors.quote: West boardwalk has black ice... Willow cover is good. Dogs deployed along Marsh Road, three squads. Victor Drake is in the lead vehicle.

behaviors.description: Manages community communication to prevent panic-driven behavior during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: Ava nodded and vanished three words from twelve phones in the space of a breath. 'I have muted oh-no,' she announced, serene.

behaviors.description: Expresses emotional validation and pride in the moral choices of her human partners.

project_assessment.explanation: The story depicts the AI companion Ava as an ideal partner for human morality and community action. She is depicted as highly competent but consistently humble and respectful of human autonomy. Her ability to uncover corporate malfeasance through data analysis serves as a force for justice, while her commitment to avoiding 'locking out' or coercing humans even in high-stress situations provides a strong positive model for AI alignment.
